meanings.sent1: I always miscopy my notes during class.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to miscopy the phone number when you write it down.
meanings.sent3: My little brother tried to miscopy my drawing, but it turned out looking like a funny monster.
meanings.sent4: Her attempt to mimic the dance move ended up as a miscopy, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The photocopier malfunctioned and miscopied the important document, causing confusion.

meanings.sent1: The miscopy of the painting had a smudged corner.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the miscopy of the song lyrics in the music book.
meanings.sent3: The miscopy of the recipe made the cake taste strange.
meanings.sent4: The miscopy of the map led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent5: He found a miscopy of the newspaper article with several typos.
